title.rendered: A Guide to Targeted Express Entry for IT Professionals

[vc_column_text]“Can I immigrate to Canada as an IT Professional with Targeted Express Entry?”

Yes, it is possible to immigrate to Canada as an IT Professional through the Targeted Express Entry program.

In today’s digital era, Information Technology (IT) professionals play a vital role in driving innovation and technological advancements across industries. The Canadian government has recognized the importance of IT professionals and has included specific occupations in the Targeted Occupations List for them. This guide aims to provide valuable information and insights for IT professionals interested in pursuing immigration opportunities in Canada.

The Targeted Express Entry Draws for IT Professionals will help eligible candidates obtain permanent residency in Canada at a lower CRS score. This is a comprehensive guide, providing detailed information about the program and outlining the specific requirements for IT professionals seeking to immigrate to Canada through Targeted Express Entry.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Understanding Express Entry Category-Based Rounds

Express Entry is a comprehensive system used by the Canadian government to manage applications for permanent residency. It is designed to attract skilled workers who can contribute to the country’s economic growth. Through Express Entry, IT professionals have a chance to obtain permanent residency in Canada and enjoy numerous benefits.

Canada announced the category-based rounds of invitations, in which candidates get assessed against certain criteria set by the Minister to fulfill economic goals. These criteria include the ability to communicate in French, relevant work experience in specific NOC TEER occupations of the National Occupational Classification (NOC Version 2021), and other general Express Entry requirements.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Targeted Express Entry for IT Professionals

Candidates in certain IT job roles are included in the Targeted Express Entry Draws conducted by the IRCC. It is important to note that meeting the eligibility criteria for Targeted Express Entry also requires eligibility for one of the three economic immigration programs: the Federal Skilled Worker Program, the Canadian Experience Class, or the Federal Skilled Trades Program.

Which IT Professionals are Eligible for Targeted Express Entry Draw?

Please note that while there are various occupations within the IT sector, the Targeted Express Entry List specifically focuses on the following occupations for IT professionals. Candidates applying under this category must have accumulated at least 6 months of continuous work experience within the past 3 years in a single occupation listed below.

Occupation NOC Code Work Experience Requirement
Computer and information systems managers 20012 At least 6 months of continuous work experience within the past 3 years in the same occupation
Computer engineers (except software engineers and designers) 21311 At least 6 months of continuous work experience within the past 3 years in the same occupation
Computer systems developers and programmers 21230 At least 6 months of continuous work experience within the past 3 years in the same occupation
Cybersecurity specialists 21220 At least 6 months of continuous work experience within the past 3 years in the same occupation
Data scientists 21211 At least 6 months of continuous work experience within the past 3 years in the same occupation
Database analysts and data administrators 21223 At least 6 months of continuous work experience within the past 3 years in the same occupation
Information systems specialists 21222 At least 6 months of continuous work experience within the past 3 years in the same occupation
Software developers and programmers 21232 At least 6 months of continuous work experience within the past 3 years in the same occupation
Software engineers and designers 21231 At least 6 months of continuous work experience within the past 3 years in the same occupation
Web designers 21233 At least 6 months of continuous work experience within the past 3 years in the same occupation
Web developers and programmers 21234 At least 6 months of continuous work experience within the past 3 years in the same occupation

To determine your NOC code accurately and ensure you have selected the correct occupation category, it is highly recommended to seek the assistance of professional immigration experts. Alternatively, you can directly check the official website of the Canadian government for the National Occupational Classification (NOC) codes.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” top_padding=”5%” bottom_padding=”5%” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][image_with_animation image_url=”14061″ animation=”None” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#707070″ column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Get Detailed Info on Targeted Express Entry Draws

[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” text=”Let’s Talk” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/contact-us” margin_top=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

How to Apply for Targeted Express Entry as an IT Professional?

To apply for the Targeted Express Entry as an IT professional, follow these steps:

Determine your Eligibility:  Ensure that you meet the eligibility criteria for the targeted occupation category. This includes having at least 6 months of continuous work experience in a single occupation listed in the Targeted Occupations List for IT professionals and meeting other eligibility requirements from one of the three federal immigration programs.

Language Proficiency: Language proficiency tests to demonstrate your proficiency in English or French. The accepted language tests for Express Entry include the CELPIP or IELTS General test for English and the TEF or TCF for French.

Create an Express Entry Profile:  Create an online Express Entry profile through the official Canadian government website. Provide accurate and up-to-date information about your education, work experience, language proficiency, and other relevant details.

Improve Your CRS Score:  Enhance your CRS score by maximizing points in areas such as language proficiency, education, work experience, and additional factors like Canadian education or work experience, provincial nomination, or a valid job offer. Seek professional guidance, if needed, to optimize your profile and improve your chances of receiving an Invitation to Apply (ITA) in the Targeted Express Entry Draw for IT professionals.

Targeted Express Entry Draw: Receive an invitation to apply in a Targeted Express Entry Draw for IT-Professionals. An ITA is required to apply for permanent residency under the Express Entry program.

Submitting an Application:  Once you receive an ITA, you will have a specified time frame to submit a complete application for permanent residency. Ensure that you compile all the required documents accurately and submit them within the given timeframe.

Medical Examinations and Security Checks:  After submitting your application, you may be required to undergo a medical examination to ensure you meet the health requirements for immigration. Additionally, security checks will be conducted as part of the application process.

Application Processing:  Once your application is submitted, it will be processed by the relevant immigration authorities. The processing time may vary, and you can track the status of your application online.

It is recommended to seek professional assistance from an experienced immigration consultant to ensure a smooth and successful application process as an IT professional under the Targeted Express Entry program.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” top_padding=”5%” bottom_padding=”5%” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][image_with_animation image_url=”14062″ animation=”None” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#707070″ column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

How Does ELAAR Immigration Help IT Professionals?

ELAAR Immigration specializes in providing comprehensive support and guidance to IT professionals aiming to navigate the Targeted Express Entry process. Our team of experts understands the unique needs and requirements of IT professionals in the Canadian job market and is committed to maximizing your chances of receiving an Invitation to Apply (ITA) as an IT professional.

We will assist you in assessing your eligibility, analyzing your Express Entry profile, and identifying areas that can be strengthened to enhance your CRS (Comprehensive Ranking System) score. Our experienced consultants will guide you through the optimization of your work experience, educational background, and other factors to ensure your profile aligns with the specific requirements of the Targeted Express Entry Draw for IT professionals.

We are offering a limited-time offer for eligible IT professionals. Sign up with us for as low as CAD $999, and avail of our comprehensive services, which include:

  • Submission of a complete and accurate Express Entry profile and/or PNP Expression of Interest
  • Support with preparing documents in advance in anticipation of receiving an ITA
  • One-on-one ZOOM appointment with an RCIC to discuss your personalized case
  • On-going support from an RCIC throughout the process and even after

Contact us today to benefit from our expertise and personalized assistance. excerpt.rendered: Are you an IT professional looking to immigrate to Canada? Discover the latest updates on Targeted Express Entry, eligibility criteria, and application process.
